CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_synced_programs ( local_program_id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, merchant_id int(11) NOT NULL, program_id int(11) NOT NULL, program_name varchar(255) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, program_category_id int(11) NOT NULL, marked int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY local_program_id (local_program_id), UNIQUE KEY program_id (program_id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
